Text: Hi! I'm the filmmaker. Thanks for your interest in my movie about arcade game collectors. If you enjoy my film, please consider making a contribution via the paypal donate button on my website: www.thespaceinvaders.org

Thank you for posting! I've been really looking forward to this video and just recently got into the arcade collecting hobby when I have spare time (so far only MAME, but still refurbishing old cabinets with real monitors nonetheless!) I think the community is so awesome and I wasn't even alive in the 80's when these games were released. Expect a donation from me soon (I also am a college student in film... So I should love this move haha)
